item.title: Welcome to TLBBD!
item.description: Welcome! This is the course website for Targeted Learning in Biomedical Big Data, offered in the Spring 2018 semester at UC Berkeley. Course Information Instructor: Mark van der Laan GSI: Nima Hejazi Lectures: TuTh 11:00A-12:30P in Mulford 230 Labs: W 2:00-3:00P in Mulford 230 Syllabus (PDF)
